main event: An unidentified flying object was observed near Ft. Bragg, North Carolina on November 9, 1957.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 3 minutes and involved 8 to 10 objects,The witnesses reported seeing a white object the size of a basketball,The object moved from the South to the Northeast,The weather conditions were clear with good visibility during the observation,Military personnel were the witnesses and conducted the observation.
sighted object: white object the size of a basketball
witness description: a member of the 14th Troop Carrier Wing
